hint.en: Activates prediction notification and triggers the flow card 'Prediction notification trigged' if the predicted consumption exceeds the limit set in the setting 'Prediction limit (Wh)'.
hint.no: Aktiverer estimeringsvarsel og trigger flow-kortet 'Estimeringsvarsel trigget' dersom estimert forbruk overstiger grensen satt i innstillingen 'Estimeringsgrense (Wt)'.
